title: LFM Platinum 2 & Above
body: Looking for a few more players interested in going hard at a ranked 5's team. In about a weeks time New Zealand exams finish, not too sure about Australia, but when that happens I'm wanting 4 other dedicated members. My IGN is ecotoxic, add me in game as long as you are Platinum 2 and above. You will also need working microphone and able to use Skype or TS, something along those lines.

replies.body:
Hey there Summoner, 

Are you looking for any particular positions. I may be able to help you with your search. I know a fair amount of New Zealanders. So just give me a shout on here and I can see what I can do.

Regards,
lols =)
says the %%%% with the toxic ego...

So you are saying that you have never flamed before on league? See if that happened I may be annoyed at people during a game that do flame, but I don't carry judgement of him and especially don't bring it to the forums, so kindly %%%% off.
just trying to help an elistist prick.
Don't know where you got the idea that i'm an elistist prike, but being toxic on the boards isn't a good way to celebrate this change.

mic* as in microphone. unless everyone needs a friend or relative named mike who works...

elitist.
